official_title: Acknowledging the achievements of the late Robert Condon and the Rolling Readers USA program he founded in advancing children's literacy.

summary.text: Acknowledges the achievements of the late Robert Condon and the Rolling Readers USA program he founded in advancing children's literacy through volunteerism. Supports the goals and ideas of the national read-in day sponsored by Rolling Readers USA to commemorate Robert Condon's achievements.

titles.title: Acknowledging the achievements of the late Robert Condon and the Rolling Readers USA program he founded in advancing children's literacy.
